questionTitle: Which of the architectural layer is used as backend in cloud computing?
questionExplanation: The cloud creates a system where resources can be pooled and partitioned as needed.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a means for accessing human researchers or consultants to help solve problems on a contractual or temporary basis?
questionExplanation: Problems solved by this human workforce have included object identification, video or audio recording, data duplication, and data research.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: With Atmos, you can create your own cloud storage system or leverage a public cloud service with Atmos online
questionOption2: IBM is a major player in cloud computing particularly for businesses
questionOption3: In managed storage, the storage service provider makes storage capacity available to users
questionExplanation: User pays for the storage using a pay-as-you-go model in managed cloud storage.

questionTitle: The _________ portion of Azure AppFabric is a claims access control system that provides a token-based trust mechanism for identity management.
questionExplanation: The Access Control examines the request, and if it finds it to be valid, it grants a security token to the client.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: The massive scale of cloud computing systems was enabled by the popularization of the Internet
questionOption2: Soft computing represents a real paradigm shift in the way in which systems are deployed
questionOption3: Cloud computing makes the long-held dream of utility computing possible with a pay-as-you-go, infinitely scalable, universally available system
questionExplanation: Cloud Computing is distinguished by the notion that resources are virtual and limitless and that details of the physical systems on which software runs are abstracted from the user.

questionTitle: Which of the following uses an authentication device?
questionExplanation: Multi-Factor Authentication gives you two layers of protection: your user id and password.

questionTitle: Which of the following discovery service can map SOA transactions and dependencies?
questionExplanation: CA Wily SOA Solution discover components such as ESBs, Web portals, and various Web services.

questionTitle: Which of the attributes is required for the best user interface?
questionExplanation: An attribute map is created to expose critical functionality.

questionTitle: Which of the following is specified parameter of SLA?
questionExplanation: Some SLAs are enforceable as contracts.

questionTitle: Which of the following manage message transactions?
questionExplanation: Data abstraction services translate messages from one format to another, as required.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Documents stored in the cloud is fully secure and are certainly under a user’s full control
questionOption2: Online productivity applications generally have fewer features than their shrink-wrapped competitors
questionOption3: Data in the cloud cannot be lost and must be managed and backed up
questionExplanation: Documents stored in the cloud may not be secure and are certainly not under a user’s full control.

questionTitle: Which of the following offers direct competition to Amazon’s S3 service?
questionExplanation: Unlike other cloud providers, Rackspace only offers managed solutions.

questionTitle: A ________ cloud requires virtualized storage to support the staging and storage of data.
questionExplanation: From a user’s perspective, it is important that the resources appear to be infinitely scalable, that the service be measurable, and that the pricing is metered.

questionTitle: Which of the following combination is possible in WebSphere ESB?
questionExplanation: An ESB may require a variety of combinations in order to support communications between a service consumer and a service provider.

questionTitle: ___________ is a personalization Web page and tool for Windows Live with status information and navigation features.
questionExplanation: Windows Live Groups is a group discussion, collaboration, sharing, and coordination tool.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: Cloud computing deployments must be monitored and managed in order to be optimized for best performance
questionOption2: To the problems associated with analyzing distributed network applications, the cloud adds the complexity of virtual infrastructure
questionOption3: Cloud management software provides capabilities for managing faults
questionExplanation: Framework products are being re-positioned to work with cloud systems.

questionTitle: Which of the following standard connect distributed hosts or tenants to their provisioned storage in the cloud?
questionExplanation: CDMI stands for Cloud Data Management Interface.

questionTitle: Which of the following cloud storage is mainly meant for developers and to support applications built using Web services?
questionExplanation: Managed cloud storage is provisioned and provided as a raw disk.

questionTitle: Which of the following is an example of a vertical cloud that advertise CaaS capabilities?
questionExplanation: It’s much easier to envisage a CaaS system built inside a private cloud where the data is under the control of a single entity.

questionTitle: Which of the following can be considered as a distributed caching system?
questionExplanation: Amazon CloudFront is referred to as a content delivery network (CDN), and sometimes called edge computing.

questionTitle: ITU-T Video Coding Experts Group (VCEG) and the ISO/IEC Moving Picture Experts Group (MPEG) created the __________ standard.
questionExplanation: Both standards are technically identical.

questionTitle: Which of the following platform features are used in Windows 7 by Microsoft?
questionExplanation: Applications for Windows Phone 7 are based on the .NET Compact Framework 4, XNA, and Silverlight Applications.

questionTitle: Which of the following cloud storage involves the provisioning of a raw virtualized disk?
questionExplanation: Cloud storage can be either unmanaged or managed.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a targeted ad service based on matching advertisers and their keywords to users and their search profiles?
questionExplanation: This service transformed Google from a competent search engine into an industry giant and is responsible for the majority of Google’s revenue stream.

questionTitle: Windows Server AppFabric enables Web data caching for application data and provides managed services using ___________Foundation and Windows Communication.
questionExplanation: Azure AppFabric Access Control enables secure application requests through a token mechanism.

questionTitle: Which of the following public-key encryption methods is used for the same purpose as TLS?
questionExplanation: WTLS stands for Wireless Transport Layer Security.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Replication creates a copy of the data which is not synchronized
questionOption2: An archive removes older information that is no longer operational and saves it for long-term storage
questionOption3: Reverse delta backup allows a system to do what is referred to as a bare metal restore
questionExplanation: A backup creates a copy of the data whereas an archive removes older information.

questionTitle: ________ virtualization abstracts networking hardware and software into a virtual network that can be managed.
questionExplanation: The key feature that makes virtual infrastructure so appealing for organizations implementing a cloud computing solution is flexibility.

questionTitle: In the Cloud Data Management Interface (CDMI), the storage space is partitioned into units called _________
questionExplanation: A container stores a set of data in it and serves as the named object upon which data service operations are performed.

questionTitle: Which of the following collaboration feature in Thinkfree Office allow user to upload documents?
questionExplanation: Other users can then view the documents, spreadsheets, or presentations that are made available to them.
